bwwExcerpt: Even with stars like Michelle Williams and Jeff Daniels in the lead roles, and direction by Joe Mantello, "Blackbird" is far from a typical Broadway drama. For some of those attracted by the bold-face names, it surely will come as a sparse shock, a tough, toxic 80-minute ride into the corporate gray...
